name: Blackbird - Superb - Toro
additionalNotes:
Started by two young brothers who cultivated a passion for fine tobacco while growing up in the Dominican Republic, the Blackbird Cigar Co. is dedicated to delivering the benchmark in modern cigar quality. Having launched in 2019, Blackbird isn't the typical story that we usually hear from a new brand. 
The Blackbird Crow is a medium-strength cigar this expertly hand rolled in the Dominican Republic. The Crow’s dark, sweet Mexican San Andres maduro wrapper cloaks a Dominican binder, which houses premium Nicaraguan and USA Pennsylvania fillers. The Blackbird’s solid construction creates a smooth draw that allows its complex flavors of spice, chocolate, and tobacco to come through.
